Based on the suppressed AS Val assault rifle and intended for concealed carry by special VIP protection teams and State Security operatives, the SR-3M Vikhr "Whirlwind" is a result of combining the qualities of the SR-3, AS VAL and VSS Vintorez. The SR-3M has a larger magazine which also provides more reliable feeding during automatic fire.
